content.raw: @iche033 , question for you about searching. I used most of the code for searching from `plugins/TopicViewer`. I also borrowed that code from Gazebo. In this case, the search doesn't have any parent/child hierarchy, is basically flat. Do you think it would make sense to create a separate `SearchModel` class to be reused by these two plugins (or others in the future)?
content.html: @iche033 , question for you about searching. I used most of the code for searching from plugins/TopicViewer. I also borrowed that code from Gazebo. In this case, the search doesn't have any parent/child hierarchy, is basically flat. Do you think it would make sense to create a separate SearchModel class to be reused by these two plugins (or others in the future)?
